extended_drawer.drawer.upgrade_fail: Can't change upgrade; too many items.
book.extended_drawers.guide.name: Extending Drawers
book.extended_drawers.guide.landing_text: This guide will take you through all the steps of setting up great storage systems using drawers, as well as how each item and block in the mod work.
book.extended_drawers.guide.subtitle: Version ${version}
command.extended_drawers.reload.fail: Failed to reload config. Check logs
config.extended_drawers.storage.drawerCa: The base capacity of drawers. This is then modified by upgrades and other options to get the final capacity.
config.extended_drawers.storage.compacti: The base capacity of compacting drawers, measured in the most compressed version. Upgrades and other options modify this.
config.extended_drawers.storage.stackSiz:
If enabled, the capacity of drawers will decrease based on the stack size of the contained items to always accept the same amount of stacks.

Compacting drawers check this on the smallest item.
config.extended_drawers.storage.slotCoun: If enabled, the capacity of each slot in a normal drawer is divided by the amount of slots. When enabled all normal drawers store the same amount of items.
config.extended_drawers.storage.upgradeM: These options control multipliers that the upgrades apply to the capacity of drawers.
The multiplier that the tier %s upgrade applies to the capacity of drawers.
config.extended_drawers.misc.insertAllTi: The max time between the clicks of a double click for inserting all items. Measured in ticks.
config.extended_drawers.misc.frontBreaki: This option controls how breaking drawer blocks works on the front face.
config.extended_drawers.misc.sideBreakin: This option controls how breaking drawer blocks works on the side, back, bottom and top faces.
config.extended_drawers.misc.blockUpgrad: If enabled, you can't remove upgrades if the slot would overflow after removal. If disabled, the drawer will drop the overflowing items on the ground.
config.extended_drawers.misc.allowRecurs: Allows you to place drawers insider shulker boxes and other drawers.
Warning: Deeply nested storage can lead to chunk and player data corruption.
config.extended_drawers.misc.drawersDrop: If enabled, drawers will drop their contents instead of retaining them when broken.
Warning: This can lead to large amounts of dropped items, causing significant lag.
config.extended_drawers.client.itemRende: The render distance of the item display on drawers. Measured in blocks.
config.extended_drawers.client.iconRende: The render distance of the lock, upgrades and other similar icons on drawers. Measured in blocks.
config.extended_drawers.client.textRende: The render distance of the items counter on the drawers. Measured in blocks.
config.extended_drawers.client.displayEm: Whether to display the amount of items on empty drawers.
config.extended_drawers.client.smallItem: The scale at which to render the items on drawers for small slots
config.extended_drawers.client.largeItem: The scale at which to render the items on drawers for large slots
config.extended_drawers.client.smallText: The scale at which to render the text on drawers for small slots
config.extended_drawers.client.largeText: The scale at which to render the text on drawers for large slots
config.extended_drawers.client.textOffse: Offset from the bottom of the slot to move the text by on drawers
config.extended_drawers.client.lockedIco: The id of icon to be displayed on locked drawers. This texture must be available on the block texture atlas (all block and item textures reside here) to work properly.
config.extended_drawers.client.voidingIc: The id of icon to be displayed on voiding drawers. This texture must be available on the block texture atlas (all block and item textures reside here) to work properly.
config.extended_drawers.client.hiddenIco: The id of icon to be displayed on hidden drawers. This texture must be available on the block texture atlas (all block and item textures reside here) to work properly.
config.extended_drawers.creativeBreaking: Break: Breaking is instant as normal.
Mine: Breaking works as in survival.
No break: Block can't be broken, like bedrock in survival.
